---------------------------------------------------------------------

In January 2014 Charly Records released Here Come the Nice: The Immediate Years Box Set 1967-1969, a lavish Small Faces package that celebrates the bandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s 1960s career on Andrew Loog OldhamÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Immediate Records label.
4-CD box set containing Ã¢â‚¬Å“every [one of the bandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s] worldwide hit single A & B side on Immediate RecordsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ plus rare and previously unreleased material, Ã¢â‚¬Å“remastered from recently-discovered original master and multi-track tapes.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ The set has been produced under the supervision of surviving band members Kenney Jones and Ian McLagan.
The first disc compiles 20 original Immediate mono single sides, while the second and third discs premiere 34 previously unreleased alternates recorded at Olympic, Trident and IBC Studios.

The fourth CD features 21 more previously unreleased outtakes and alternates, plus live material from the Small FacesÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ Newcastle City Hall gig of November 18, 1968.
